name: Westbound #1
description: Westbound #1 This photograph was taken in southern Ontario in the late afternoon from a westbound train just after a light snowfall. The shutter speed was quite slow causing nearer trees and objects to blur as they rushed past the window. Ready to hang! These 100% matte cotton media with archival pigment prints are framed and assembled using conservation grade materials and are ready to hang. I've chosen a thin black anodized aluminum frame, a soft white acid-free mat, and acrylic (not glass) glazing for light weight and safety. Limited Edition! Only six prints will be made of this image. Small Framed $290 - 6 x 24 inches - Edition of 3 Only three prints will be made at this size. Image is 6x24" (15x60cm). Framed to 9x27". Medium Framed $490 - 9 x 37 inches - Edition of 2 Only two prints will be made at this size. Image is 9x37 inches, about 22x92cm. Framed to 12x40. Large Framed $1890 - 16 x 64 inches - One Print Only Only one print will be made at this size. Image is 16x64 inches (about 40x160cm). Purchaser can specify some framing details. The print will be framed accordingly and will be shipped to you ready to hang. Contact me before ordering. About shipping: Shipping calculated by the shopping cart. If you want to pick up your print, put your order through with the shipping and I'll refund the shipping manually (it's not a very smart shopping cart). About the watermark: The black watermark shown on the sample images on this site doesn't appear on the prints.
